Data: Roach to Hughes, 1 run short of a length outside off and he punches it just wide of point

Roach to Hughes, no run
Roach to Hughes, no run fullish and moving across and he drives this one crisply but straight to cover
Roach to Hughes, no run 144.8 kph, short of a length and angling towards the off stump and he punches it to Roach's left
Roach to Hughes, no run 145.2 kph, angles across him a bit more and he stays back and slices it to point
Roach to Hughes, 1 run wider outside off and plays a flashy square cut that rolls down to third man

Narine to Marsh, 2 runs fullish on the pads and clipped wide of mdwicket

Roach to Hughes, FOUR runs lovely shot! It was a good length ball a touch wide outside off and he showed the full face and punched it just wide of mid-off and cover, timing and placement perfect
Roach to Hughes, no run chops it down to point and tells his partner to stay back
Roach to Hughes, no run 144 kph, little shorter in length and he punches it down to mid-on
Roach to Hughes, no run this was fuller and Hughes misses an opportunity to put that away, flicks it down to midwicket
Roach to Hughes, FOUR runs quite stylish! Hughes plays a Caribbean style pull on one leg, 144 kph, used the pace and ran it down the big gap at deep square leg
Roach to Hughes, no run short outside off and he dabs it down to point
Narine to Marsh, no run stays on the back foot and works it to point
Narine to Marsh, no run Marsh goes for the forceful drive but extra bounce this time beats him

Bravo to Marsh, FOUR runs nobody moved! Poor ball from Bravo, half volley wide outside the off stump and he leans forward and crashes that wide of mid-off and cover

Bravo to Hughes, OUT Pollard the juggler! After surviving an appeal for a caught behind Hughes tries to slash this one away wide of backward point on the front foot, flies off the bat and Pollard leaps like a goalkeeper, the ball lobs up and he keeps his eyes on it and takes the catch on the second attempt

Sammy to Voges, 1 run nearly a run-out! Voges gets a leading edge to the off side and there's hesitation from both batsmen, somebody had to take a call on the run, they go through with it, Pollard dives and underarms the throw to the bowler's end but nobody backing up, Voges was nowhere close

Pollard to Faulkner, 1 run just opens the face of the bat and steers it just wide of the keeper, short third man cuts it off

Pollard to Faulkner, no run this one skids through and keeps a touch low, he slashes and misses
Best to Voges, FOUR runs Best not quite as effective as in his first spell, starts off with a half volley outside off and he leans forward and drives effortlessly wide of mid-off, goes to the 90s
Best to Voges, 1 run fullish on the pads and he works it away down to midwicket, runs coming too easily
Best to Faulkner, FOUR runs streaky! Faulkner makes a bit of room, the ball was rearing up and he adjusted well and upper cut it over the keeper, Thomas didn't know where that was going
Best to Faulkner, 4 leg byes Best is leaking them, this time he strays on the pads and he tucks it away off his pads and it rolls towards fine leg

Best to Voges, 1 run
Bravo to Voges, 1 leg bye drifts on the pads and he works it off the legs to the on side
Bravo to Faulkner, 2 runs slower ball short and wide outside off and he slaps that down to cover and there's a fumble, West Indies looking a bit weary here
Bravo to Faulkner, 1 run slower ball on the pads and he works it down to long-on

Bravo to Faulkner, 1 run makes a bit of room and steers it down to point
Best to Faulkner, 1 run attempts a fast yorker and he hammers a low full toss down to long-on

Best to Voges, FOUR runs West Indies getting sloppier in the field, this was pulled away and racing towards deep midwicket, Powell runs to his left and tries to boot it away, the ball deflects and hits the rope

Best to Voges, 2 runs that's a century for Voges! On the body and clipped away wide of square leg, he runs the first hard and puts pressure on the fielders for the second, gets home comfortably, 100 off 97 balls!
Best to Voges, 1 leg bye makes room and the ball hits his pads and rolls to the off side, hitting him well outside leg, a desperate Best appeals
Best to Faulkner, 1 run on the pads and he works it behind square leg
Best to Voges, 1 run makes room and pulls a length delivery down to long-on
Roach to Voges, 1 run slower delivery and he flat-bats that down to long-on
Roach to Faulkner, 2 runs bangs it in short and he makes room and flat-bats it in the air down to long-on, Pollard runs across and cuts it off
Roach to Faulkner, 1 run another forehand down the ground to long-on, no this is not the Rod Laver arena
Roach to Voges, 2 runs fires that fuller and he clips it down to deep square leg, dives at the crease for the second
Roach to Voges, no run he makes room and walks across his stumps, the ball just sneaks past the leg stump, should have put that away
Roach to Voges, 2 runs bit short outside off and he hammers it down to sweeper cover
Best to Faulkner, 1 run Best starts off with a low full toss towards leg and he makes room and hammers it down to long-on
Best to Voges, no run 149.4kph, that reached the keeper in a flash, the batsman made room and swished at thin air
Best to Voges, SIX runs clean as a whistle! That was just as quick as the previous ball, made himself room and lofted him downtown flat over long-on
Best to Voges, 1 bye Slower ball and Voges swings too early and misses

Best to Faulkner, 2 runs makes room and swings and gets an outside edge that runs down to third man, Roach fires the throw to the keeper and Thomas makes the mistake of breaking the stumps with his boot! He then hits the stumps with the glove with ball in hand and Faulkner short of the crease but you can't give that out
Best to Faulkner, 1 run makes room and pushes it down to mid-off to end the innings

Voges has done enough to get a regular gig in the line-up. The selectors should be impressed with this innings considering he came in with Australia struggling a bit. Join us in half an hour for the chase. It's going to take a lot for the West Indies to chase this, since they're short on confidence.

6.05pm: Fantastic comeback by Australia, for a score of 274 didn't look likely at the end of 30 overs. It was slow going before Haddin and Voges came together for a stand of 111 at more than a run a ball.West Indies lost the plot and couldn't maintain the pressure. Their body language and fielding didn't look encouraging at all.

McKay to Charles, 2 runs fullish in length outside the off stump and he drives him through the gap at cover
McKay to Charles, FOUR runs poor bowling, he drifts on the pads with the short fine leg in, just a gentle tickle and it races away for four
McKay to Charles, 1 run close call! He tapped it towards cover and set off, Bravo had to hurry and the underarm throw by Coulter-Nile was just wide of the stumps
McKay to Bravo, FOUR runs lovely shot, this was short outside the off stump and he stays back and punches it wide of cover and point
Johnson to Charles, no run angles it across the right-hander and he nearly gets an edge
Johnson to Charles, no run stays behind the line and softly pushes it to the off side
Johnson to Charles, no run this was angling across him and he chased it, not too far from the edge there
Johnson to Charles, no run much better this time, it was pitched up and straightening and Charles decides to leave it alone
Johnson to Charles, 1 run this was full and wide and deserving to be hit, he comes forward and gets a thick outside edge to third man
Johnson to Bravo, no run comes round the wicket to Bravo, he gets across and defends to the off side
Cutting to Charles, no run hits a good length on the off stump, Charles taps it to the off side

Cutting to Charles, 3 runs excellent fielding again! Charles had some width and he pushed it past cover point and two fielders gave chase, Coulter-Nile pulled it back before the rope and Marsh did the rest
Cutting to Bravo, 1 run good length on middle and leg and he tucks it down to fine leg
Cutting to Charles, no run fullish on the off stump and he softly pushes it to the off side
Cutting to Charles, no run turns at the crease and works it to the leg side but can't get it past short fine leg
Cutting to Charles, 1 run gets across and pushes it just to mid-off's left, pinches a single
Johnson to Charles, FOUR runs clean hit, this was short and Charles did well to stay back and control the pull wide of square leg, times it well and finds the gap too
Johnson to Charles, 1 run 142 kph, this was short too and he sliced it down to third man, controlled shot
Johnson to Bravo, 1 run short of a length and he stays beside the line and pushes it to the off side
Johnson to Charles, no run gets across his stumps and pushes a full delivery down to mid-off
Johnson to Charles, 1 run pitched up and he tries to go over the top but places it wide of third man, not where he intended, Cutting cuts it off (pun unintended)
Johnson to Bravo, no run stays back at the crease and knocks it to the off side
Cutting to Charles, no run fullish in length outside the off stump and pushed towards the off side
Cutting to Charles, 1 run pushes a full delivery down to mid-off, they take a single
Cutting to Bravo, no run fullish in length outside off and he punches it down to extra cover
Cutting to Bravo, 1 run goes back at the crease and knocks it to the on side
Cutting to Charles, 1 run drifts back in and he works it away to the on side
Cutting to Bravo, no run works it away to the on side
Faulkner to Charles, 1 wide short and wide and he went for a slash and for a few seconds Australia thought they had him, missed the bat
Faulkner to Charles, no run 136 kph, stays behind the line and he works it back to the bowler
Faulkner to Charles, 1 run goes back at the crease and works it to the on side
Faulkner to Bravo, no run pokes his bat out at one that moves across, not far from the edge
Faulkner to Bravo, 1 run stays beside the line and chops it to the off side
Faulkner to Charles, 1 run clips it away behind square on the on side
Faulkner to Bravo, no run short of a length on middle and off and he stays back and defends this one
Doherty to Charles, 1 leg bye tossed up and he tucks it off his pads, may have pitched outside leg, the ball straightened
Doherty to Bravo, 1 run tossed up from round the wicket, clips it to the on side for a single
Doherty to Charles, 1 run chips down the track and works it away wide of midwicket
Doherty to Bravo, 1 run fires that flatter and he drives him hard down to sweeper cover
Doherty to Charles, 1 leg bye slower through the air and he clips it away off his pads to short fine leg
Doherty to Bravo, 1 run tosses it up and he reaches forward and scoops it over cover
Faulkner to Bravo, 1 run good length wide outside off and he cuts him hard but there's protection in the deep
Faulkner to Charles, no run tries to force that away wide of mid-on but he mistimes it
Faulkner to Charles, 1 run pushes a half volley outside off and down to mid-off
Faulkner to Bravo, no run bangs it in short this time and he gets under it very quickly
Faulkner to Bravo, 1 run stays back and he works it wide of midwicket
Faulkner to Charles, 1 run knocks it in front of midwicket and takes a quick single
Doherty to Charles, 1 run skids through and he works it to the on side
Doherty to Bravo, 1 run goes on the back foot and punches it wide of cover
Doherty to Charles, 1 run comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
Doherty to Bravo, 1 run flatter delivery and he knocks it down to square leg
Doherty to Charles, no run
Doherty to Charles, 1 run comes forward and gets a leading edge that drops safe
Faulkner to Charles, 1 run stays back and pushes it to the off side
Faulkner to Bravo, 1 wide bangs in the bouncer this time but it's down the leg side and he's penalised for it
Faulkner to Bravo, no run tempts him with width and Bravo goes for the booming cover drive but misses
Faulkner to Bravo, no run this was in the channel outside off and it completely beat him, first slip got a bit excited
Faulkner to Bravo, 1 run stays back at the crease and angles this one down to third man, safely played
Faulkner to Charles, 1 run stays back at the crease and angles it down to third man
Faulkner to Bravo, FOUR runs poor ball to end the over, drifts on the pads and he shuffles and works it down to fine leg, well clear of the fielder
Doherty to Charles, 1 run tossed up and he comes forward works it to deep square leg
Doherty to Bravo, no run tossed up and he plonks forward and defends
Doherty to Bravo, 1 run flatter delivery and he works it down to square leg
Doherty to Charles, 1 run pushes it down to cover point for a quick single
Doherty to Bravo, no run flatter delivery and he defends to the off side
Doherty to Bravo, no run clips his pads but going down leg
Faulkner to Charles, 2 runs a touch risky! This was wide outside off and slashed just over the leaping backward point
Faulkner to Charles, 1 run full and pushes it through the line just wide of mid-off
Faulkner to Bravo, no run good length outside off and he punches it down to backward point
Faulkner to Bravo, no run tries the yorker and he comes forward and jams it out just wide of extra cover
Faulkner to Bravo, 1 run stays on the back foot and he punches it wide of point
Faulkner to Charles, 2 runs bowls it full and wide and he can't resist the lofted drive, good enough for a couple as the sweeper cuts it off
Doherty to Bravo, no run tosses it up and he thrashes it straight to mid-off
Doherty to Bravo, FOUR runs bang! Doherty tosses it up and Bravo charges down the pitch scoops it high over mid-off, rocketed away
Doherty to Bravo, 1 wide drifts down the leg side and wide called
Doherty to Bravo, 1 run bowls it flatter and he stays back and cuts him to deep point
Doherty to Charles, 1 run fuller delivery and drilled down the ground to long-off
Doherty to Bravo, no run comes forward and defends to the off side
Doherty to Bravo, 1 run tossed up and he works it with the turn to long-on
Cutting to Bravo, no run bangs it in short and down the leg side and he ducks under it
Cutting to Bravo, 2 runs short on the body and he hops back and softly tucks it towards fine leg, they take the first quickly
Cutting to Bravo, no run pitched up and he goes for the drive, good delivery, straightens and nearly takes the outside edge
Cutting to Bravo, no run good length on middle and leg and he stays back and defends
Cutting to Bravo, 1 run good length on middle and leg and he works it away down to mid-on
Cutting to Charles, 1 run good length outside off and he safely dabs this one down to third man to bring up his fifty! He has looked quite composed
Doherty to Charles, no run tossed up and he comes forward and defends
Doherty to Charles, FOUR runs close call for Charles! He chips down the track and lofts down to wide long-on, Faulkner was far too forward from the rope and the ball just cleared him
Doherty to Charles, no run pushes it to the off side
Doherty to Charles, 1 run now he chips down the track and goes for the slog and mistimes it
Doherty to Bravo, 2 runs fired full and flat outside off and he drives hard, misfield at short cover
Doherty to Bravo, no run drops it with soft hands towards the off side

Cutting to Charles, no run Appeal for a caught behind and the umpire shakes his head! Australia are reviewing it. It was short and Charles was looking to pull, the ball certainly hit his arm, Hot Spot showed a slight edge off the bat before hitting the arm, but Charles gets the benefit of the doubt! Was the Hot Spot not con
Cutting to Charles, 2 runs attempts the shot again, this was short and pulled along the ground, deep square leg cuts it off
Cutting to Charles, SIX runs see you downtown! This was a length delivery and Charles used the crease and swung his arms, connected cleanly and sent it over wide long-on
Cutting to Charles, FOUR runs shot! This was short and wide and he slashed at it and sent it wide and safe of backward point
Cutting to Charles, 1 run dabs it toward short third man for a single
Cutting to Bravo, no run
Doherty to Charles, no run tossed up and he comes forward and defends
Doherty to Charles, no run close call! Tucked to the leg side, Haddin gathered and had a shy at the stumps at his end and missed
Doherty to Charles, 1 run
Doherty to Bravo, 1 run clips it away towards square leg for a single
Doherty to Charles, no run stays back and slashes it down to short third man
Johnson to Bravo, no run comes round the wicket and he blocks it to the off side
Johnson to Bravo, no run stays beside the line and he steers it to the off side
Johnson to Bravo, 3 runs streaky shot by Bravo as he leans forward and checks his drive wide of cover, in the air but in the gap
Johnson to Charles, 1 run angles it from round the wicket and he works it to the leg side
Johnson to Bravo, no run close call for Bravo as he gets one that rears up from outside off, he goes for the slash but doesn't have any room for the shot
Johnson to Bravo, no run stays beside the line and knocks it to the covers
Doherty to Charles, no run gets on his knee and sweeps to the leg side
Doherty to Charles, 1 run missed stumping! Charles was down the pitch and yorked himself, Haddin didn't see it at all
Doherty to Bravo, no run pushes it to the off side
Doherty to Bravo, 1 run goes on the back foot and punches it wide of cover
Doherty to Charles, no run this one straightens and just sneaks past the inside edge
Doherty to Charles, no run flatter delivery and clipped to the on side
Johnson to Bravo, 1 wide that's a big bouncer and he's penalised for it

Johnson to Bravo, 2 runs Hughes drops a skier! Bravo took his hand off the bat and skied that miles in the air, didn't control it, Hughes was moving to his right at cover, somehow lost it in the lights
Johnson to Bravo, SIX runs and follows that up with a six! All happening here, it was pitched up and he went forward and lofted it over long-off
Johnson to Bravo, no run
Johnson to Pollard, no run 143 kph, thudded into Haddin's gloves, Pollard doesn't offer a shot
Johnson to Pollard, no run 144 kph, this was closer to the off stump and he leaves it alone
Doherty to Charles, no run flatter delivery and he pushes it back to the bowler
Doherty to Charles, no run fullish on the stumps and he drives down the ground to long-on
Doherty to Charles, 1 run
Doherty to Pollard, no run tossed up and he comes well forward and drives to mid-off
Doherty to Pollard, 1 run gets well forward and drives him to mid-on
Doherty to Charles, FOUR runs Charles soldiers on, tossed up and full outside off, he leans forward and smashes it past short cover
McKay to Pollard, no run Pollard gently pushes it to the off side, sets off and heads back
McKay to Pollard, no run bangs it in short and it's the slower bouncer, he ducks under it
McKay to Pollard, no run stays back and punches it towards cover
McKay to Pollard, 1 run sharp single, he was on the back foot to punch it towards mid-off and set off immediately, the fielder couldn't gather quickly enough
McKay to Charles, 1 run picks it from outside off and goes for the slog but mistimes it
McKay to Pollard, no run end the over with a bouncer, Pollard safely ducks under it
Faulkner to Charles, no run good length on the off stump and he stabs it back to the bowler
Faulkner to Charles, no run the slower ball and he didn't pick it well, slashes and misses
Faulkner to Charles, 2 runs the substitute Carters drops a sitter! This was pitched up and lofted towards sweeper cove and the fielder had it covered but somehow the ball slipped out

Faulkner to Charles, no run Appeal for an lbw and Charles has been given out and he reviews it! It pitched in line and straightened and replays showed an inside edge, the doubt was also whether the ball brushed the front pad before hitting the edge, not conclusive enough, Charles survives. What a night he's having!
Faulkner to Charles, 1 run leans forward and gets an outside edge wide of point
Faulkner to Pollard, no run
McKay to Charles, FOUR runs nothing's stopping Charles tonight! This was full and wide outside off, he reaches out and drives and gets an outside edge past the keeper, no slip
McKay to Charles, no run short outside off and he slashes and misses
McKay to Charles, no run another slash and a miss! This was closer to the off stump, Charles on the edge
McKay to Charles, 2 runs gets beside the line and he slices him wide of backward point
McKay to Charles, 1 leg bye drifts on the pads and he tucks it to the leg side
McKay to Pollard, 1 run stays back and stabs it down the ground to long-on
Faulkner to Pollard, 1 run overthrows! Punched towards mid-off, they set off and Charles is sent back, Doherty hits the stumps and they take a run off the ricochet
Faulkner to Charles, 2 runs stays back and pulls just wide of short midwicket for a couple, managed to find the gap
Faulkner to Charles, no run on the off stump and he defended it to the off side
Faulkner to Charles, 1 run
Faulkner to Pollard, FOUR runs Pollard's first boundary! This was short outside the off stump and he stayed back, swiveled and pulled in front of square, found the gap well
Faulkner to Pollard, no run stays right back at the crease and defends to the off side
Cutting to Charles, 1 run full and wide outside the off stump and he reaches out and gets an outside edge down to third man
Cutting to Pollard, no run good length outside off and punched down to cover
Cutting to Pollard, no run stays back at the crease and knocks it down to mid-on, the field's up
Cutting to Pollard, no run Pollard gets one that rises up a bit and he slashes and misses
Cutting to Pollard, no run persists with that line just outside off, there are fielders in the ring, Pollard punches it straight to short cover
Cutting to Pollard, 1 run this time he stands tall and knocks it just wide of point and takes a sharp single, Johnson dives
Faulkner to Pollard, FOUR runs exquisite drive straight after drinks! Half volley on the off stump, he leans forward and pushes it through the line and beats mid-off and long-on running across
Faulkner to Pollard, no run skids through and hits his pads as he tries to knock it away
Faulkner to Pollard, no run stays behind the line and defends back to the bowler
Faulkner to Pollard, 1 run good running, punches it towards mid-off and set off quickly
Faulkner to Charles, no run goes back at the crease and mistimes the punch back to the bowler
Faulkner to Charles, 1 run bowls that full and wide outside off and he gets forward and drives to sweeper cover
Cutting to Charles, 1 run the slower bouncer this time and he fetches it high on the bat and controls the pull down to deep square leg
Cutting to Pollard, no run punched on the up square on the off side and backward point does well to get around and stop it
Cutting to Pollard, 2 runs that's a good delivery and well played, zips towards the legs and he manages to flick it down to fine leg
Cutting to Pollard, no run skids through and he stays behind the line and defends down the track
Cutting to Pollard, no run 142 kph, a slash and a miss to keep the Australians interested! Tried to force it through the off side, close to the edge
Cutting to Pollard, 2 runs he bowls it short and it hurries on him, goes for the pull and miscues it but there's nobody at square leg
Finch to Charles, no run that was quick and flat, he does well to gt his bat down and defend
Finch to Charles, no run slower through the air this time and he drives to the off side
Finch to Charles, 2 runs full and wide outside off and he drives just wide of short cover
Finch to Charles, no run this was fired flat and quick and he punches it to mid-on
Finch to Charles, no run stays back and knocks it to short cover
Finch to Charles, no run stays back and he knocks it down the track
Cutting to Pollard, 2 runs on the body and he clips it away wide of square leg, good running to pick up two
Cutting to Pollard, no run tries to force that through the off side but can't beat mid-off
Cutting to Pollard, 1 wide this was down the leg side, Cutting not controlling his line there
Cutting to Pollard, no run better delivery, it was a bouncer and he quickly ducks under it
Cutting to Pollard, 1 run stays back and knocks it wide of square leg for a single
Cutting to Charles, no run slower delivery and he pushes it down to short cover, can't find the gap
Cutting to Charles, no run he makes a hint of room and tries to steer that past backward point, doesn't get the placement right
McKay to Pollard, no run fullish in length on the off stump and he drives back to the bowler
McKay to Pollard, 1 run shorter on the body and he shuffles and clips it to the leg side
McKay to Charles, 2 runs makes a hint of room and pulls along the ground in front of square, picks up a couple
McKay to Charles, FOUR runs That's Johnson Charles' first century in elite cricket would you believe it! Outside off and he opens the face of the bat and deliberately dabs it wide of the wicketkeeper
McKay to Pollard, no run stays back and defends back to the bowler
Cutting to Deonarine, no run goes back at the crease and defends back to the bowler
Cutting to Deonarine, no run doesn't give him room, he can only knock it to the off side
Cutting to Deonarine, FOUR runs he's got his eye in now! This was pitched up outside off, cleared his front leg and slammed it over the bowler and mid-on
Cutting to Thomas, no run outside edge and it drops short of first slip! He played it with soft hands and it fell well short of Finch
Cutting to Thomas, no run nervy start for Thomas! He tried to shoulder arms but the ball took the inside edge and rolled to the keeper
McKay to Pollard, no run the slower ball and he reads it late and gets forward and defends
McKay to Pollard, no run another slower one and defended and there was the slight danger of the ball rolling back to the stumps, Pollard was alert
McKay to Pollard, no run keeps it nice and tight, straight on the stumps and Pollard defends
McKay to Pollard, no run keeps him quiet four balls in a row! Defends with soft hands and the ball nearly dribbled to the stumps again
McKay to Pollard, no run make that five, another good slower ball, outside off and Pollard decides not to play at it
McKay to Pollard, 1 run top over from McKay in the Powerplay, this time it's a single down to square leg
Cutting to Pollard, no run Pollard stays back and swivels and pulls but can't beat mid-on, the fielder's at the edge of the circle
Cutting to Pollard, 2 runs this was fractionally short and he pulls along the ground wide of midwicket, pushes for the second, Thomas dives
Cutting to Pollard, 1 run drifts on the body and he stays back and clips it wide of square leg
Cutting to Thomas, 1 run fuller delivery and he leans forward and drills that one down to mid-off and sets off
Cutting to Pollard, 1 leg bye this one skids through, hits his pads and deflects towards third man, just one run, WI need boundaries
Cutting to Thomas, no run keeps him quiet, tucks him up for room and Thomas is happy to come forward and drive to cover
Doherty to Pollard, 1 run skids through and he stays back and punches it down to long-on
Doherty to Thomas, no run flatter one on the pads and he can't flick it away
Doherty to Thomas, 1 leg bye shuffles and knocks it off his pads down to short fine leg
Doherty to Pollard, 1 run bashes a full delivery down the ground to long-off
Doherty to Thomas, 1 run tossed up and he works it down to long-on
Doherty to Pollard, SIX runs On the sightscreen! Phew! Tossed up, Pollard uses the crease and effortlessly lofts straight down the ground, flush on the blackboard

Cutting to Thomas, SIX runs Thomas shows Pollard he can do it too! That was too full, on middle and leg and he lofts crisply over wide long-on, at least three spectators wanted it and the lad dropped it
Cutting to Thomas, 1 run stays back and knocks it down to to the on side and they take a single
Cutting to Pollard, no run good length on the off stump and defended down to cover
Cutting to Pollard, 1 run this was short and he swivels and pulls down to deep square leg
Cutting to Thomas, 1 run shuffles at the crease and knocks it down to square leg
Cutting to Pollard, no run ends the over with a bouncer, Pollard was quick to get underneath it
McKay to Thomas, 1 run slower ball and Thomas cleverly dabs it down to point with soft hands and gets off the strike
McKay to Pollard, 1 wide McKay strays down the leg side and wide called, he should be careful since the fine leg is up
McKay to Pollard, 2 runs mixup! He tucks it down to long-on, they pick up a second and it looked like both batsmen were ball-watching, Pollard dives
McKay to Pollard, 1 run steal a sharp single there! Slower ball and he awkwardly fends it off one-handed to the on side, sets off quickly
McKay to Thomas, 1 run cleverly done again, he opens the face of the bat and gently steers it wide of short third man for a single
McKay to Pollard, 1 run stays back at the crease and pushes it firmly down to long-off
McKay to Thomas, 1 run slower ball and driven firmly back to the bowler and McKay slides and fumbles, well they sneak in another single
Johnson to Thomas, FOUR runs well played! Johnson fires that from round the wicket, Thomas leans forward, opens the face and deliberately runs it down to third man, no slip
Johnson to Thomas, no run good length on middle and leg and he stays behind the line and defends
Johnson to Thomas, 1 run good length on the pads and he stays back and clips it to the leg side, Thomas doing this well
Johnson to Pollard, 1 run pushes it softly down to mid-on and calls quickly for the single
Johnson to Thomas, 1 run fullish in length outside off and he squirts it just wide of short cover
Johnson to Pollard, 1 run bowls it short on the body and he stays back and quietly knocks it to the leg side
Faulkner to Pollard, 1 run drifts on the pads and he stylish whips it on the up down to deep square leg

Faulkner to Thomas, OUT Appeal for a run out and Thomas in the firing line! Squirted down to backward point, Marsh fumbled but gathered quickly and hurled it to the bowler, Thomas was struggling, he dived and his bat was in the air when Faulkner whips off the bails. The bowler did well to get behind the stumps
Faulkner to Pollard, 1 run fuller delivery and he drills it down to long-on
Faulkner to Sammy, no run stays back at the crease and he defends down to cover, tells Pollard to stay back
Faulkner to Sammy, 1 run bowls that full outside off and he crunches it down to long-off
Faulkner to Pollard, no run slower ball outside off and very tempting for Pollard, he swished at it and missed, the field on the off side is up
Johnson to Sammy, 1 run stays right back at the crease and he punches it down to cover
Johnson to Pollard, 1 run drifts on the pads and he shuffles and works it to the on side
Johnson to Sammy, no run this time he pitches it up and goes for the big drive but misses, a dot ball!
Johnson to Sammy, no run Sammy missed out there! Half volley outside off and he can only drill it straight to cover
Johnson to Sammy, 1 run much better by Sammy as he stabs one down to point and gets off strike
Johnson to Pollard, 1 run a single is all he will get, pacy delivery on the body and he shuffles and works it wide of Johnson, he keeps the strike though
Faulkner to Sammy, no run he shuffles and works it to the on side
Faulkner to Sammy, no run outside off and he pushes it to the off side
Faulkner to Sammy, 1 run stays on the back foot and punches it to the off side
Faulkner to Narine, no run that's a yorker length which he drills down towards cover, can't do much with that
Faulkner to Narine, no run yet another dot ball! Narine doesn't offer a shot this time, maybe wants to leave the hitting to his captain
Johnson to Sammy, 2 runs Sammy stays back at the crease and just slaps it between mid-off and cover but not good enough for a four
Johnson to Sammy, FOUR runs he gets a boundary this time! This was short from round the wicket, stayed at the crease and clubbed it in the air and just wide of deep square leg
Johnson to Sammy, FOUR runs targets that boundary again! This was short and he swiveled and pulled this one along the ground to fine leg, 30 off 15
Johnson to Sammy, 1 run backs away and he drills a full delivery down to mid-off, disappointed he couldn't put that away
Johnson to Roach, no run shuffles across and he gets hit on the pads, too quick for him
Faulkner to Sammy, no run that's a nasty yorker! Sammy lost his balance and fell over at the crease, managed to flick it to the on side
Faulkner to Sammy, 1 run makes room and crashes a full delivery down to long-off
Faulkner to Roach, 1 bye this one skidded through and beat the bat as he tried to cut, Haddin fails to gather it
Faulkner to Sammy, 1 run makes room and bashes another full delivery down to long-off
Faulkner to Roach, 2 runs shuffles across and Roach tries to clear midwicket but miscues it, no fielders there
Faulkner to Roach, no run Roach tries to swish this away as well and it's a slower ball, swings and misses
McKay to Sammy, SIX runs Sammy's not done yet! It was a full delivery wide outside off, he made room and smashed that over long-off
McKay to Best, no run Best wanted to smash that over the on side, instead it lobs to the off side, can'
McKay to Best, no run slower ball and he swings and misses, Australia are all but through

West Indies won't be on that plane back home yet. There's the T20 at the Gabba on Wednesday. Their last chance to salvage a win in what's been a miserable tour. Do join us for that. Thanks for your company today. Cheers!
Australia won by 17 runs
Player of the match is Adam Voges, AUS
